Class SettingsActivity

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class SettingsActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
implements android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener
    Activity showing general settings and headers leading to game settings.
    All settings are defined in XML in res/xml/preferences.xml.
    Author:
    Mike Klimek
    See Also:
    Settings Guide
